assignments.value:
Convert transcript into a well structured document with sections #, subsections ##, subsubsections ###, lists, and other standard markdown elements.
Use the decimal system 1, 1.1, 1.2, 1.2.1, 1.2.2 for section, subsection and subsubsection numbering.  For example, "# Overview"

DO NOT be overenthusisastic to create subsubsections and subsections.  A good rule of thumb is don't divide into sections and subsections if the material is less than 3 paragraphs long.
Do NOT Create lists for each item in a section/subsection/subsubsection. Use paragraphs. 
DO USE a list, if you want to identify a numbered or ununmbered list of items that are each just a few words each.  

IGNORE:
- Pitches to watch other vidoes or any other marketing comments
- Commercials where the other is pitching other products
